com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table

Class BeanTableModelAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table.BeanTableModelAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RowModelListener, PropertyChangeListener, Serializable, EventListener, TableModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PagedTabularPropertyInspector.PaginateBeanTableModelAdapter, SortedBeanTableModelAdapter

    public class BeanTableModelAdapter
extends AbstractTableModel
implements RowModelListener, PropertyChangeListener
    Adapter for adapt RowModel interface into TableModel interface.
    See Also:
